about.title: Explore {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides versatile options for embedding image signatures anywhere within your business documents. Streamline workflows by adding images to PDFs, Word documents, Excel sheets, PowerPoint presentations, and popular image formats using our powerful library.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document signing features
more_features.description: Our API supports a broad range of signature functionalities. You can easily add, update, remove, search, and validate different types of signatures, including image-based signatures.

feature_1.title: Insert images into office documents
feature_1.content: Embed electronic signatures and images at any chosen spot within a document. Enhance your documents with images, barcodes, text, metadata, or digital certificates to improve functionality and security.

feature_2.title: Signature search and validation
feature_2.content: Ensure document integrity by verifying the authenticity of signatures. Retrieve a detailed list of all signatures within a document and assess their individual properties.

feature_3.title: Edit existing signatures
feature_3.content: Easily update the content, appearance, size, or position of signatures within your documents to meet changing needs.

feature_4.title: Remove unnecessary signatures
feature_4.content: Our API provides full control, allowing you to remove signatures from most supported file formats whenever needed.

formats.title: Embed images in multiple file formats
formats.description: Use the {{EnvName}} API to insert images into various document formats. Easily resize, position, select specific pages, and apply image-based signatures, giving you complete control over your document's layout.
